TextBody: Hello, SK D&D, one of our clients, requires a new EPP deployment on AWS. Based on the details provided below, please kindly proceed with uploading the necessary AMI and inform us upon completion. Once the AMI has been successfully deployed, two modifications are required to adapt it for the Korean market: 1. Change the license type to legacy. 2. Optimize the HDD size. Subject: FW: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #426730 -  - [CSSK support] Request for AMI Deployment for SK D&D Client’s EPP AWS Setup    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0IBM66:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000IBM66:ref

Hi Andrei,



Our partner, Datasecure, has checked the AMI shared by Filip, and SK D&D is ready for remote support.

Please kindly provide two schedules for remote support next week at 4 PM KST, Korean standard time (9 AM Romanian time).
Then, I will inform the customer, let them choose one, and get back to you.
(From now on, I will request AMI sharing directly from Filip and will only reach out to you for remote support.)

The remote support will be the same as usual, like below:


  1.  Licensing needs to be changed to “Legacy”
  2.  Internal HDD size of EPP AMI needs to be resized to the side of customer’s AWS resource where EPP AMI is on.
  3.  Optimize EPP internal variables to reflect the client numbers of the EPP AMI


I am looking forward to your two schedules.

Have a nice day!
Thank you for your support.


Best Regards,
Jack Jung

Support Team | www.cososys.kr<http://www.cososys.kr>
Tel +82 1644 7718, Fax +82(2)6008 5330

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #426730 -  - [CSSK support] Request for AMI Deployment for SK D&D Client’s EPP AWS Setup    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0IBM66:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000IBM66:ref

Hi Andrei,



I am sending you this email due to a specific request during today’s remote support.
Please kindly adjust the optimization for #3 to meet the A1000 standards: they use 350 clients, and this adjustment is to ensure sufficient buffer capacity.
1. Licensing needs to be changed to “Legacy”
2. Internal HDD size of EPP AMI needs to be resized to the side of customer’s AWS resource where EPP AMI is on.
3. Optimize EPP internal variables to reflect the client numbers of the EPP AMI

Kindly see you in Zoom!
Thank you for your support


Best Regards,
Jack Jung

Support Team | www.cososys.kr<http://www.cososys.kr>
Tel +82 1644 7718, Fax +82(2)6008 5330
